---
date: "2025-02-25"
title: "Seek Tune - An implementation of Shazam's song recognition algorithm"
slug: "seek-tune"
tags: [ github, scraping, crawling, tools, productivity ]
---



[SeekTune][1] is an implementation of Shazam's song recognition algorithm based on insights from [these resources][2]. It integrates Spotify and YouTube APIs to find and download songs.

![Seek Tune Screenshot][3]



   [1]: https://github.com/cgzirim/seek-tune
   [2]: https://github.com/cgzirim/seek-tune#resources--card_file_box
   [3]: https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/88312276/354935665-e4d01e9c-05cf-4f35-acbc-1e3cd79d1e00.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..G98TmMUBo4adBEH5_M6PNCuTgZdGxu7BI4O3Mv2gbEk
